title: Philadelphia Eagles vs. New York Giants NFL Game at Jake's Steaks
text:
Philadelphia Eagles vs. New York Giants NFL Game at Jake's Steaks Where 
5:30 p.m. Monday, Oct. 19, 2015 Categories 
Events, Nightlife | Singles, Sports The Philadelphia Eagles will be taking on the NEW YORK GIANTS this Monday Night Football. Come see the Eagles fly and fight with a full house of San Francisco/Bay Area Eagles fans. Remember, Jakeâ€™s Steaks tradition is Green Jello Shots at every Eagles touchdown! So watch out as green Jello shots wiz by your head as you sing FLY EAGLES FLY and chant E-A-G-L-E-S with the crowd. Jake's Steaks will be showing this key match, along with all NFL games every day! Our NFL Sunday Tickets and premium sports packages offer every NFL and college/NCAA football games. Make Jake's Steaks your Marina/San Francisco NFL central. Your NFL sports bar! Head out to Jake's Steaks and enjoy : $3/Glass Coors Light during all football games 6 for $15 Bottled Budlight during all football games GREEN JELLO SHOTS on every Eagles touchdown! Best Philly Cheesesteaks in San Francisco, Tastykake, Full selection of beers on tab/bottle Best Sports Bar in San Francisco www.jakessteaks.net Related
